mapper.select: select celebrity_idx, celebrity_name, celebrity_image, type_idx from t_celebrity order by celebrity_idx desc
select celebrity_idx, celebrity_name, celebrity_image, c.type_idx , type_name from t_celebrity c, t_type t where c.type_idx = t.type_idx and c.type_idx = 1 order by celebrity_idx asc

select c.celebrity_idx, celebrity_name, m.member_idx, member_name, member_image, member_contents from t_celebrity c, t_member m where c.celebrity_idx = #{celebrityIdx} and c.celebrity_idx = m.celebrity_idx order by member_idx desc limit 1

select c.celebrity_idx, celebrity_name, m.member_idx, member_name, member_image, member_contents from t_celebrity c, t_member m where c.celebrity_idx = #{celebrityIdx} and c.celebrity_idx = m.celebrity_idx order by member_idx asc
select member_idx, member_name, member_image, member_contents from t_member where member_idx = #{memberIdx} order by member_idx desc
select celebrity_idx, celebrity_name, celebrity_image, c.type_idx , type_name from t_celebrity c, t_type t where c.type_idx = t.type_idx and c.type_idx = 2 order by celebrity_idx asc
select fan_idx, ftitle, fhit_cnt, date_format(fcreated_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as fcreated_dt from t_fan where fdeleted_yn = 'N' order by fan_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_fan (ftitle, fcontents, fcreated_dt, fcreated_id) values ( #{ftitle}, #{fcontents}, now(), 'admin' )
mapper.select: select fan_idx, ftitle, fcontents, fhit_cnt, date_format(fcreated_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as fcreated_dt, fcreated_id from t_fan where fdeleted_yn = 'N' and fan_idx = #{fanIdx}
